ygData.subject: Is blacksmithing broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: Everyone notice how last night all the other skills got some changes EXCEPT blacksmithing.  Oh well. Any how.  I have a feeling blacksmithing is broke.  My
ygData.messageBody:
Everyone notice how last night all the other skills got some changes EXCEPT blacksmithing. Oh well.

Any how. I have a feeling blacksmithing is broke. My skill is 126 or somewhere near there. I can make all items with only a few failures. (I hate legs though, seem to fail a lot.)
I have made well over 100 pieces of armor over the past couple of weeks, and have not seen a single point of skill increase. I didn't have any problem getting skill up to 126 making all the standard stuff, then I start making armor, and I get nothing. My Int is about average 86. I'm thinking that getting skill from making armor is broke. Has anyone else seen this? Also, I know some armor items are trivial, and I know I'm not making a ton of trivial armor items. I've made plenty of legs, mails, cloaks, mantles, etc.

Any insight you folks can provide would be great.

Also, why aren't there banded gloves. I have people asking me for these all the time. Let's get those /feedback /bugs going and get some changes to blacksmithing in the works.


Whaat!!! Have you tried The Doghouse??! Get your FREE WEB-BASED EMAIL account at:
http://doghousemail.lycos.com
